<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_mispers_action_item"> <x_snc_mispers_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <address>Lancaster Place, 8-11 Lancaster Street, Leicester, LE3 7HB</address> <assigned_to display_value="Emilia Oxley">b5826bf03710200044e0bfc8bcbe5d1e</assigned_to> <case display_value="MISPERS0001002">6a009c311b745990db301f83b24bcb9a</case> <due_date>2023-08-08 11:36:00</due_date> <id>2762135</id> <notes>Address Check- Lancaster Place Apartments, 8-11 Lancaster Street, Leicester, LE3 7HB
MFH has made a booking through booking.com for one of these apartments and is believed to have stayed there from 5th-6th August 2022.
Contact there is 07567527525- lady called Andi. MFH paid Â£63 for the room Address was identified through the MFH's call data, Andi has called the MFH's mobile on 5/8/22 at 12:57hrs.
NPO to attend address to try and confirm if the MFH has been there as Andi has not seen him in person so cannot confirm. Speak to occupants of other apartments, show them an image of our MFH. Does anyone recognise him? If so, can we add an official sighting to compact?</notes> <number>ACTION0001007</number> <report_reference>35</report_reference> <start_date>2022-08-08 11:36:00</start_date> <status>Suspended</status> <summary>false</summary> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-06 08:31:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>49738b8d1bf59190db301f83b24bcbcd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 10:59:47</sys_updated_on> <title>Address Check- Lancaster Place Apartments, 8-11 Lancaster Street, Leicester, LE3 7HB</title> <type>Address Checks</type> </x_snc_mispers_action_item> </record_update>
